subject: Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Tommy Cross scored at 3 minutes 17 seconds of overtime to lift Boston College past Boston University, 3-2, in overtime in the semifinals of the Beanpot tournament in Boston.
snippet: Tommy Cross scored at 3 minutes 17 seconds of overtime to lift Boston College past Boston University, 3-2, in overtime in the semifinals of the Beanpot tournament in Boston.
